title: Good Movie
review: It was a terrible event. Good thing the gulf has more oil spilled naturally than that on a daily basis and it cleaned it self up, but not until after O used the event to fleece BP, set up a phony stop on drilling in the US to cause the price of fuel to sky rocket so he would have an excuse to funnel trillions to alternative energy, crony corporations to enrich his friends in the US and his Saudi political donors, destroy US jobs, bring more foreign money into the Clinton foundation. Propel himself into the next election so he could continue the destruction of the economy, release prisoners into the population and let illegals cross the border unchecked to cause even more strain on law enforcement and the economy.
